headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://id.worldcoin.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://id.worldcoin.org; img-src 'self' data: https://id.worldcoin.org; font-src 'self' data: https://id.worldcoin.org; connect-src 'self' https://id.worldcoin.org https://sentry.io https://status.worldcoin.org; frame-src https://id.worldcoin.org;
